A rabbi was attacked at knifepoint in Vienna by a woman who ripped the Jewish skullcap from his head and yelled an anti-Semitic threat before fleeing, police in the Austrian capital reported on Tuesday. Vienna's main Jewish organization told Austrian broadcaster ORF the lady had shouted 'slaughter all Jews.'

full_sentence: I keep saying this to everyone. Women have zero real value to society, except their incubation abilities, and the sexual attraction.
